who.title: Who I am
who.txt1: My name is Charles Mangin, I'm 23 years old and I am a multimedia student based in France.
who.txt2: I always liked to create stuff, and now I do it as a job!

what.title: What I do
what.txt1: I am fairly polyvalent. I have a degree in management, I studied law, and I will soon have a degree in multimedia.

list.item1: Development: How to create websites from A to Z, using multiple programming languages (see below).
list.item2: Design: How to create visual identities (including, but not limited to: mock-ups, landing pages, logos, animations).
list.item3: Audio-visual: How to film and edit videos.
list.item4: Communication: How to communicate on the internet, while keeping in mind SEO challenges.

list.item1: Team management: How to organize and manage projects and teams.
list.item2: Communication & marketing: Analysing markets, choosing the best strategies to adopt based on the needs of the client.
list.item3: Accounting & finance: Analysing costs, knowing how to keep up with a budget.
list.item4: Law: French business laws and administrative laws.
